Package Controller

Class ReservationController

java.lang.Object
Controller.ReservationController
public class ReservationController extends Object
Controller class handling the restaurant's reservations.

  • Method Details

    • createReservation

      public Reservation createReservation​(int resID, Date resTime, int paxSize, String name, String contactNo, String memberID)
      Creates a new reservation based on the input.
      Parameters:
      resID - the reservation ID
      resTime - the reservation time
      paxSize - the pax size of the reservation
      name - the name of the customer
      contactNo - the contact number of the customer
      memberID - the member ID of the customer, "no" if not a member
      Returns:
      the reservation that is created

    • checkReservation

      public int checkReservation​(int idRes)
      Finds a given reservation based on ID and updates its validity.
      Parameters:
      idRes - the ID of the reservation
      Returns:
      the index of the reservation if found, -1 if invalid, -2 if not found

    • deleteReservation

      public void deleteReservation​(int idxRes)
      Deletes a given reservation.
      Parameters:
      idxRes - the index of the reservation to be removed

    • displayReservation

      public void displayReservation​(int idxRes)
      Displays a given reservation.
      Parameters:
      idxRes - the index of the reservation to be displayed

    • getReservationName

      public String getReservationName​(int resID)
      Gets the reservation name for a given reservation ID.
      Parameters:
      resID - the ID of the reservation
      Returns:
      the name of the customer, or null if the ID can't be found
